improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The variable x is decremented to 0 in the loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 8. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before performing the division.

Unreachable code. The loop always executes 10 times. The original value of x is 10 and is decremented each iteration, reaching 0 after the 10th iteration. Since y is assigned 1/x in line 8, the value of x is 0. Therefore, the runtime will crash due to division by zero.
The loop iterates 10 times, always decrementing x. It is always going to be 0 at the end, hence the division by zero at line 8. Add a check to prevent this.
